alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:08AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wood, Portage, western Marathon, Winnebago, Waushara and southwestern Waupaca Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 404 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from north of Minneapolis east-southeast into central Wisconsin. Movement of these storms was to the southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Torrential downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain may lead to localized flooding. The axis of heavy rain will be generally south and west of a line from Wausau to Oshkosh where 1 to 2 inches of rain is expected with locally higher amounts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood
